description: From trailhead follow path up from parking area through trees, heading North, on old road. When you reach a T intersection turn right and follow path through some thick brush. About 15 or so mins. the path will be intersected by a path on your left heading N follow this up through the forest until you reach a large grassy meadow and hill.  Follow the trail up through the meadow to  the top of the hill heading N to NW. At the top you will see the trail going down into the cairn, scree valley. Follow this trail ubhill it heads up the other side to the base of a large rock rib. Find your way up this rib and follow the ridge NW to the summit of Mist Mountain 3139m.
directions: Trans-Canada Hwy. west from Calgary turn of a Kananaskis Hwy. 40 and follow this hwy. south about 67km over the Highwood Pass From the Pass travel anothe 13km. and on your left you will see a large open grass area ,park there and head up through the trees.  If you get to Mist Creek or Mist Creek Day use area you have gon too far.
title: Mist Mountain
